languages.text: "Не понимаю, элантах. Я правда должна участвовать в столь примитивном ритуале? Тонкость нашей связи... это не то, что можно описать словами. И уж точно не то, что требует доказательств или оправданий". {n}Ирлиэт складывает руки в замысловатом жесте и отворачивается, однако продолжает осторожно наблюдать за вашей реакцией.{/n}

"I do not understand, elantach. Must I truly partake in such a base ritual? The subtlety of our bond... is not something that can be put into words. And certainly not something that demands proof or explanation." {n}Yrliet brings her hands together in an elaborate gesture and turns away, but you can see that she is still warily observing your reaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Не понимаю, элантах. Я правда должна участвовать в столь примитивном ритуале? Тонкость нашей связи... это не то, что можно описать словами. И уж точно не то, что требует доказательств или оправданий". {n}Ирлиэт складывает руки в замысловатом жесте и отворачивается, однако продолжает осторожно наблюдать за вашей реакцией.{/n}

languages.text: 「分からないのだが、エランタ。我は本当にこんなに基本的な儀式に参加しなくてはならないのか？我々の絆の繊細さは言葉にできるようなものではない。そして間違いなく証拠や説明が必要なものでもない。」{n}ユリエットは仰々しく手を合わせて背を向けたが、彼女が用心してあなたの反応を伺っているのが見て取れた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not understand, elantach. Must I truly partake in such a base ritual? The subtlety of our bond... is not something that can be put into words. And certainly not something that demands proof or explanation." {n}Yrliet brings her hands together in an elaborate gesture and turns away, but you can see that she is still warily observing your reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「分からないのだが、エランタ。我は本当にこんなに基本的な儀式に参加しなくてはならないのか？我々の絆の繊細さは言葉にできるようなものではない。そして間違いなく証拠や説明が必要なものでもない。」{n}ユリエットは仰々しく手を合わせて背を向けたが、彼女が用心してあなたの反応を伺っているのが見て取れた。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “我不明白，外界人，我真的要卷入如此原始的事情之中吗？我们之间微妙的关系……是无法用语言表达的。当然，也不需要证明，更不需要任何解释。”{n}伊莉耶特将双手交叉在一起，做了个曼妙的手势，随后转过了身。不过你看得出来，她依然在小心翼翼地观察着你的反应。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not understand, elantach. Must I truly partake in such a base ritual? The subtlety of our bond... is not something that can be put into words. And certainly not something that demands proof or explanation." {n}Yrliet brings her hands together in an elaborate gesture and turns away, but you can see that she is still warily observing your reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我不明白，外界人，我真的要卷入如此原始的事情之中吗？我们之间微妙的关系……是无法用语言表达的。当然，也不需要证明，更不需要任何解释。”{n}伊莉耶特将双手交叉在一起，做了个曼妙的手势，随后转过了身。不过你看得出来，她依然在小心翼翼地观察着你的反应。{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je ne vous suis pas, elantach. Faut-il vraiment que je prenne part à un rituel aussi bassement terre à terre ? La subtilité de nos liens... n'est pas quelque chose que l'on peut exprimer avec des mots. Ce qui nous unit se passe de preuves et d'explications. » {n}Yrliet joint les mains en un geste compliqué avant de se détourner, mais vous voyez bien qu'elle reste sur le qui-vive, guettant votre réaction.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not understand, elantach. Must I truly partake in such a base ritual? The subtlety of our bond... is not something that can be put into words. And certainly not something that demands proof or explanation." {n}Yrliet brings her hands together in an elaborate gesture and turns away, but you can see that she is still warily observing your reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je ne vous suis pas, elantach. Faut-il vraiment que je prenne part à un rituel aussi bassement terre à terre ? La subtilité de nos liens... n'est pas quelque chose que l'on peut exprimer avec des mots. Ce qui nous unit se passe de preuves et d'explications. » {n}Yrliet joint les mains en un geste compliqué avant de se détourner, mais vous voyez bien qu'elle reste sur le qui-vive, guettant votre réaction.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No lo entiendo, elantach. ¿De verdad debo participar en un ritual tan mundano? La sutileza de nuestro vínculo... no es algo que se exprese con palabras. Y desde luego no es algo que haya que demostrar ni explicar». {n}Yrliet junta las manos en un complicado gesto y aparta la mirada, pero ves que estudia cautelosamente tu reacción.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not understand, elantach. Must I truly partake in such a base ritual? The subtlety of our bond... is not something that can be put into words. And certainly not something that demands proof or explanation." {n}Yrliet brings her hands together in an elaborate gesture and turns away, but you can see that she is still warily observing your reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «No lo entiendo, elantach. ¿De verdad debo participar en un ritual tan mundano? La sutileza de nuestro vínculo... no es algo que se exprese con palabras. Y desde luego no es algo que haya que demostrar ni explicar». {n}Yrliet junta las manos en un complicado gesto y aparta la mirada, pero ves que estudia cautelosamente tu reacción.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich verstehe nicht, Elantach. Muss ich wirklich an so einem simplen Ritual teilnehmen? Die Subtilität unserer Verbindung ... ist nichts, was sich in Worte fassen lässt. Und schon gar nicht etwas, das Beweise oder eine Erklärung erfordert." {n}Yrliet legt in einer komplexen Geste ihre Hände aneinander und wendet sich ab, aber du siehst, dass sie deine Reaktion nach wie vor genau beobachtet.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not understand, elantach. Must I truly partake in such a base ritual? The subtlety of our bond... is not something that can be put into words. And certainly not something that demands proof or explanation." {n}Yrliet brings her hands together in an elaborate gesture and turns away, but you can see that she is still warily observing your reaction.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich verstehe nicht, Elantach. Muss ich wirklich an so einem simplen Ritual teilnehmen? Die Subtilität unserer Verbindung ... ist nichts, was sich in Worte fassen lässt. Und schon gar nicht etwas, das Beweise oder eine Erklärung erfordert." {n}Yrliet legt in einer komplexen Geste ihre Hände aneinander und wendet sich ab, aber du siehst, dass sie deine Reaktion nach wie vor genau beobachtet.{/n}
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Anlamıyorum elantach. Böylesi alçaltıcı bir eyleme gerçekten katılmam gerekiyor mu? Bağımızın duygusallığı... Kelimelere dökülemeyecek bir şey. Kanıt ya da açıklama gerektiren bir şey olmadığı da aşikâr." {n}Yrliet, ellerini bir araya getirerek karmaşık bir hareket yapıp geri dönse de tepkini hâlâ dikkatle gözlemlediğini görebiliyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do not understand, elantach. Must I truly partake in such a base ritual? The subtlety of our bond... is not something that can be put into words. And certainly not something that demands proof or explanation." {n}Yrliet brings her hands together in an elaborate gesture and turns away, but you can see that she is still warily observing your reaction.{/n}

Kanıt ya da açıklama gerektiren bir şey olmadığı da aşikâr." {n}Yrliet, ellerini bir araya getirerek karmaşık bir hareket yapıp geri dönse de tepkini hâlâ dikkatle gözlemlediğini görebiliyorsun.{/n}
